cve-search.title: CVE Search
cve-search.published-date-range-explanation:
These parameters specify when vulnerabilities were added to vulnerability database during the period.

It is not necessary to provide both dates nor any of them.
cve-search.modified-date-range-explanation:
These parameters specify when vulnerabilities were modified in vulnerability database during the period.

It is not necessary to provide both dates nor any of them.
cve-search.page-size-explanation: Number of vulnerabilities displayed on one page.
cve-search.keywords-explanation: Retrieve records where a word is found. If there is more than one word matches every word independently.

not-found-page.title: Not found
not-found-page.explanation: Page you are looking for could not be found.
